trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of ConfigurationLocationCollection objects.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de objetos ConfigurationLocationCollection.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationLocationCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects, which represent the resources for which location-specific configuration settings are defined.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe ConfigurationLocationCollection para iterar por meio de uma coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>objetos que representam os recursos para os quais definições de configuração específicas de local são definidas.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>

trans-unit.source: ConfigurationLocationCollection is the type returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationLocationCollection é o tipo retornado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ConfigurationLocationCollection class might not reference the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects in the order that they are specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ConfigurationLocationCollection a classe não pode fazer referência à coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>objetos na ordem em que foram especificados no arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item accessor to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to get a specific <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> object from the collection by specifying its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o acessador de Item para o <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection>classe para obter um determinado <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation>objeto da coleção, especificando seu índice na coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: A posição do índice de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection"> </xref> para retornar.
